dashboard.addWidgetTitle: Add a widget to the dashboard
dashboard.shareTitle: Share this dashboard with a colleague
dashboard.shareSuccess: Share link copied to your clipboard
dashboard.shareError: Share link could not be copied to your clipboard: {url}
dashboard.manualTitle: Manual layout allows to position widgets freely in the dashboard
dashboard.autoTitle: Automatic layout compacts the view to the top-left corner, when space is available
dashboard.fixedTitle: Fixed layout prevents the dashboard from being modified

dashboard.saveAsTitle: Save the dashboard to open it later
dashboard.saveAsModalMessage: Enter a name for this dashboard
dashboard.setDefaultConfirm: Do you want to set "{dashboard}" as the default dashboard?
dashboard.setDefaultSuccess: "{dashboard}" was set as the default dashboard
dashboard.renameWidgetMessage: Enter a new name for this widget

avgClicksByQueryTimeLine.text: Average Document Clicks By Search Query
avgClicksByQueryTimeLine.info: Average number of click for a search query

avgQueriesBySessionTimeLine.info: Average number of search queries per session

avgResponseTimeTimeLine.info: Average response time (in ms). It includes backend and engine.

avgResponseTime.info: Average response time (in ms). It includes backend and engine.

responseTimeTimeLine.info: Response time (in ms). It includes backend and engine.

avgMRRTimeLine.info: Mean reciprocal rank. MMR is an average on result rank clicked. The More it is closed to 1, the more results are relevant. The 1 value is obtained when the rank #1 (first result) is clicked for a given query.

avgMRR.info: Mean reciprocal rank. MMR is an average on result rank clicked. The More it is closed to 1, the more results are relevant. The 1 value is obtained when the rank #1 (first result) is clicked for a given query.

clickRank1TotalTimeLine.info: Number of search where the user clicks on the first document.

clickRank1TotalRate.info: Number of search where the user clicks on the first document compared to the total number of search.

clickRank3TimeLine.info: Number of search where the user clicks on the first 3 documents.

clickRank3.info: Number of search where the user clicks on the first 3 documents.

clickTotalTimeLine.info: Number of documents clicked for a search.

newUsersTimeLine.info: Users that have logged-in for the first time

newUsers.info: Users that have logged-in for the first time

queryBounceTimeLine.info: Number of Bounce for a search query. A bounce is when an user clicks on a document but does not read the content (based on the dwell time)

queryBounce.info: Number of Bounce for a search query. A bounce is when an user clicks on a document but does not read the content (based on the dwell time)

queryBounceRate.info: Number of Bounce for a search query compared to the total number of search

queryClickTimeLine.info: Number of search queries where the user has clicked on a document at least one time.

queryClick.info: Number of search queries where the user has clicked on a document at least one time.

queryClickRate.info: Number of search queries where the user has clicked on a document at least one time compared to the total number of search

queryRefineTimeLine.info: Number of search queries where the user has to do a refinement (like usage of facets)

queryRefine.info: Number of search queries where the user has to do a refinement (like usage of facets)

queryRefineRate.info: Number of search queries where the user has to do a refinement compared to the total number of search

queryZeroTimeLine.info: Number of search queries with no matched results

queryZero.info: Number of search queries with no matched results

queryZeroRate.info: Number of search queries with no matched results compared to the total number of search

regularUsersTimeLine.info: Number of users for who it's not the first time.

regularUsers.info: Number of users for who it's not the first time.

adoptionRate.info: Number of new users compared to the total number of potential user

regularUsersRate.info: Number of users compared to the total number of potential user

regular_newUsers.info: Number of regular users compared to total the number of new user

searchExitTimeLine.info: Number of search where the user does nothing after displaying a results page

searchExit.info: Number of search where the user does nothing after displaying a results page

searchExitRate.info: Number of search where the user does nothing after displaying a results page compared to the total number of search

queryByResult.info:
Last action after a search:
 - 'search.exit.logout': Do a search, do not click on a document, logout.
 - 'search.exit.timeout': Do a search, do not click on a document, leave the page.
 - 'search.with.click': Do one or several searches, click on a document as a last action.
 - 'search.with.no.click':  Do one or several searches, do not click on a document as a last action.

topNoResultQueries.info: Most frequently queries asked with no result

sessionsByUser.info: Average number of session per user

avgQueriesBySession.info: Average number of search per session

avgClicksByQuery.info: Average number of clicked document per search

docViewsBySession.info: Average number of viewed documents (Document Navigator) per search

trendsCalculations.title: Trends calculations
trendsCalculations.label: Use the preceding period of same duration
trendsCalculations.tooltip: For example, if  "Last 6 months " is selected above, trends will be automatically computed against the previous 6 months period
trendsCalculations.customPeriodTooltip: This period is used a baseline to measure the evolution of the metrics displayed in the dashboard
